title: Best Custom, Destination Event Planning | Why Choose CSI DMC | CSI DMC
text:
Why CSI DMC
 
Our Story
For over three decades, CSI DMC has been transforming events into exceptional experiences for organizations across the globe. Founded in 1987 on Capitol Hill in Washington, DC, our team of talented professionals, including designers, destination experts, and event management specialists, are dedicated to ensuring the success of our clients.
With boundless creativity, deep destination knowledge, extensive local relationships, global resources, and proven logistical expertise, we are the award-winning, strategic partner that clients trust to deliver exceptional events in over 65 destinations every year.
 Where may we create your next exceptional experience? 
Meet The Team
THE CSI DMC DIFFERENCE
Innovation is at the core of our company. Our award-winning team offers fresh ideas and creative solutions, unmatched logistical expertise, and a deep local knowledge that is backed by national resources and leadership who support ingenuity. We strive to consistently produce extraordinary, one-of-a-kind programming, serving as a one-stop resource for our clients, providing individualized service and attention to detail. CSI DMC is dedicated to being your strategic partner and a true extension of your team, tying the goals of your program to the authenticity of the destination. No matter the size or scope of your event, we are excited to start planning!
A TRACK RECORD OF SUCCESS

CSI DMC IN THE COMMUNITY
Do good, feel good.  The CSI DMC team is passionate about engaging with our local communities. Giving back to our destinations is an integral part of our company culture. Both as individuals and together in our teams, we dedicate time and energy to the causes and organizations that are dear to our hearts.
